![](sn-stream-2020.png)

This dataset is a subset of the Shale Network database and includes all stream water samples from Northeastern U.S in the Shale Network database as of June 2020. [Click this link](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.scitotenv.2020.140105){target="_blank"} to access the dataset (as Appendix A) and the corresponding peer-reviewed article that interprets the dataset.
